Potential 1.title: Flash Freezer
Potential 1.description: Combo skill Flashfreezer υ37 improved: Effect radius +20%; releases energy 2 more times; and gains an additional 15 Ultimate Energy after dealing DMG.

Potential 3.title: Tink-a-Power
Potential 3.description: Talent Freezing Point improved: Against enemies with Cryo Infliction, Critical DMG Dealt +10%; this effect is also doubled against enemies with Solidification.

Potential 4.title: Rebellious Mood
Potential 4.description: Battle skill Brr-Brr-Bomb β improved: If the first explosion hits only one enemy, return 10 SP.

Potential 5.title: Expert Mechcrafter
Potential 5.description: Ultimate Cryoblasting Pistolier improved: During the ultimate, ATK +10% and Critical DMG Dealt +30%.
